mapper.sql: oid, stu_id, name, address, sub_name,post, memo, oper_date, duration, status
mapper.select:
select count(*) from t_volunteer as tc where 1=1
AND tc.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')

select tc.* from t_volunteer as tc where 1=1
AND tc.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')
order by tc.oid desc
limit #{start},#{length}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_volunteer
stu_id,
name,
address,
subName,
post,
memo,
operDate,
duration,
status,
stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sub_name = #{subName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oper_date = #{operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update t_volunteer set stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_name = #{subName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_date = #{operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_volunteer
stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sub_name = #{subName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oper_date = #{operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
